body_html:
@CBrauer It should be possible to use the latest Anaconda installer. I am using Anaconda3-4.3.0.1-Windows-x86_64 on a Windows 10 machine.

While it by default uses Python 3.6 as you pointed out, you can simply create a conda environment based on Python 3.5 and then install TensorFlow into it.

The only issue I ran into, is the one already opened #7873.
